t: Prospects For Amazon In Private Label Products
s: August 8, 2017 - Quartz investigates secret brands owned by Amazon that aren't clearly identified to consumers as such. These stealth brands aren't much to worry about. The big private label opportunity for Amazon is in its AmazonBasics product line.

t: What are new-to-brand metrics, and why should I use them?
The Complete Guide to Amazon’s Private Label Brands | Pattern
s: Instead of trying to make these products go away, brands should focus on their marketing and product quality so their product is still worth buying for consumers despite a slightly higher price. If you’re a third-party merchant selling products on Amazon, you may feel intimidated by the prospect ...

t: Watch Prospect | Prime Video
s: Starring Pedro Pascal, Sophie Thatcher and Jay Duplass, this sci-fi will leave you breathless with its other-worldly splendour anchored by an emotional story. A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote alien moon to harvest elusive gems hidden in the depths of the moon's toxic forest.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: The Life and Death of the Amazon Brands
s: August 15, 2023 - They sold well, and Amazon spent the next decade quietly expanding its house brands under dozens of inconspicuous names — Goodthreads, Solimo, Pinzon, Lark & Ro, Mama Bear, and Presto, to name a few — targeting thousands of high-demand categories with mostly budget-conscious items.
